alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 1:53PM PST until January 31 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects..
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
